Producer: Peter Bakalian, Arthur Rankin Jr., James G. Robinson
Screenwriter: Margaret Landon, Oscar Hammerstein II, Arthur Rankin, Peter Bakalian, Jacqueline Feather, David Seidler, Brian Nissen
Synopsis: Anna, an English schoolteacher, travels to the kingdom of Siam to teach children and finds her challenge with a stubborn king. But even as a wondrous friendship grows between Anna and the arrogant monarch, an evil sorcerer is conjuring up a plot to steal the throne.
Title: The King and I
